note.p: Career: Ensign in the Coldstream Guards (1702), Lieutenant and Captain (1705); Quarter Master (1710); Lieutenant-Governor of Nevis and of St Kitts (1715); Lieutenant-General of the Leeward Islands; Governor of Antigua
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Dalton; Dalton George I
Notes: On PL for 1751 and not after. A Governor Mathews of Antigua died 30 Sep 1752 (vide GM 1752 p 478), so this may have been the FRS.
